articles.title: OpenAI, Anthropic Team Up for Research on Hallucinations, Jailbreaking
articles.summary: OpenAI and Anthropic, two of the biggest rivals in artificial intelligence, recently evaluated each others’ models in an effort to better understand issues that their own tests may have missed.
articles.translated_title: OpenAI, Anthropic Team Up for Research on Hallucinations, Jailbreaking
articles.translated_summary: OpenAI and Anthropic, two of the biggest rivals in artificial intelligence, recently evaluated each others’ models in an effort to better understand issues that their own tests may have missed.

articles.title: Anthropic Says Attacker Used AI Tool in Widespread Hacks
articles.summary: A hacker leveraged technology from Anthropic PBC as part of a vast cybercrime scheme that’s impacted at least 17 organizations, the company said, marking an “unprecedented” instance of attackers weaponizing a commercial artificial intelligence tool on a widespread basis.
articles.translated_title: Anthropic Says Attacker Used AI Tool in Widespread Hacks
articles.translated_summary: A hacker leveraged technology from Anthropic PBC as part of a vast cybercrime scheme that’s impacted at least 17 organizations, the company said, marking an “unprecedented” instance of attackers weaponizing a commercial artificial intelligence tool on a widespread basis.

articles.title: New Michigan laws ban AI-generated pornography
articles.summary: It's now illegal in Michigan to create images via artificial intelligence that falsely portrays a specific person in sexual activity or situations.
articles.translated_title: New Michigan laws ban AI-generated pornography
articles.translated_summary: It's now illegal in Michigan to create images via artificial intelligence that falsely portrays a specific person in sexual activity or situations.

articles.title: US Stocks Fluctuate as Traders Await Nvidia Earnings Results
articles.summary: US stocks shuffled between gains and losses on Wednesday ahead of Nvidia Corp.’s quarterly earnings, due after the closing bell, which will offer crucial insights into the artificial-intelligence trade.
articles.translated_title: US Stocks Fluctuate as Traders Await Nvidia Earnings Results
articles.translated_summary: US stocks shuffled between gains and losses on Wednesday ahead of Nvidia Corp.’s quarterly earnings, due after the closing bell, which will offer crucial insights into the artificial-intelligence trade.

articles.title: World shares are mixed and US futures are flat ahead of Nvidia’s earnings update
articles.summary: World shares were mixed Wednesday ahead of an earnings update by computer chip giant Nvidia that may provide insights into the state and future of artificial intelligence.
articles.translated_title: World shares are mixed and US futures are flat ahead of Nvidia’s earnings update
articles.translated_summary: World shares were mixed Wednesday ahead of an earnings update by computer chip giant Nvidia that may provide insights into the state and future of artificial intelligence.

articles.title: How to spot bad AI writing using Wikipedia's new list
articles.summary: Wikipedia's new Signs of AI Writing is a great tool for detecting prose generated by artificial intelligence.
articles.translated_title: How to spot bad AI writing using Wikipedia's new list
articles.translated_summary: Wikipedia's new Signs of AI Writing is a great tool for detecting prose generated by artificial intelligence.

articles.title: A hacker used AI to automate an 'unprecedented' cybercrime spree, Anthropic says
articles.summary: A hacker has exploited a leading artificial intelligence chatbot to conduct the most comprehensive and lucrative AI cybercriminal operation known to date, using it to do everything from find targets to write ransom notes
articles.translated_title: A hacker used AI to automate an 'unprecedented' cybercrime spree, Anthropic says

articles.title: China aims to triple AI chip output, reducing Nvidia's dependency, FT says
articles.summary: China's chipmakers are seeking to triple the country's output of artificial intelligence chips in 2026, rushing to reduce dependence on Nvidia , the Financial Times reported on Wednesday.
articles.translated_title: China aims to triple AI chip output, reducing Nvidia's dependency, FT says
articles.translated_summary: China's chipmakers are seeking to triple the country's output of artificial intelligence chips in 2026, rushing to reduce dependence on Nvidia , the Financial Times reported on Wednesday.

articles.title: Hollywood’s Don’t Ask, Don’t Tell AI Dilemma: Using Artificial Intelligence Can Kill or Catapult Your Career
articles.summary: Hollywood seems to have a don't ask, don't tell dilemma regarding the use of AI for creative purposes, with some saying it could make or break careers.

articles.title: Artificial Societies Raised a $5.35 Million Seed With This Deck
articles.summary: Artificial Societies raised the seed funding for AI agents that simulate consumer networks. Here's an exclusive look at its pitch deck.
